Click me! Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com About About TakeCare is a social Android app written in Java and developed on Android Studio, suitable for all audiences over the age of 13.\nIn the app, you choose the role of either a giver or a taker at any given time. A giver shares a thing that they own but are not interested in, whereas a taker can browse such things and choose one to schedule a pickup.\n\nAmong the things you can share with others (or express your interest in):\n\u2022 Food\n\u2022 Furniture\n\u2022 Study material\n\u2022 Hitchhikes\n\u2022 Lost & Founds\n\u2022 Just about anything you see fit!\n\nJoin the sharing revolution: help brighten someone\'s day, and also help the world by not excessively throwing away like in most modern families!
